judgment.error: Order not uploaded by concerned court

business_details.Business: The complainant is present.  The allegations are u/s 376 IPC, R.W. provisions of POCSO Act.  Considering the nature of case, I am of the view that in this case police investigation is necessary.  Hence, the case is forwarded to O/C, Juria P.S. for registration, investigation and submission of F.F. u/s 156(3) Cr.P.C. Send the original complaint with copy of order to the P.S., keeping copy of complaint and order sheets at Court for future reference.  The concerned O/C of P.S. to report compliance within 20 days.
